dcterms:description: A new speech dataset, DDS, to facilitate the research on speech enhancement. DDS provides aligned parallel recordings of high-quality speech and a number of versions of low-quality speech, producing approximately 2,000 hours of speech data. It covers 27 realistic recording conditions by combining diverse acoustic environments and microphone devices.
dcterms:title: DDS

dcterms:creator: G. J. Mysore
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides insights and challenges in transforming speech recorded on common consumer devices in real-world environments into professional production quality speech.
dcterms:title: DAPS

dcterms:creator: J. Yamagishi
C. Veaux
K. MacDonald
dcterms:description: An English multi-speaker corpus designed for the CSTR Voice Cloning Toolkit, providing a diverse set of recordings for voice cloning applications.
dcterms:title: VCTK

dcterms:creator: C. K. Reddy
E. Beyrami
J. Pool
R. Cutler
S. Srinivasan
J. Gehrke
dcterms:description: A scalable noisy speech dataset designed for speech enhancement research, providing a framework for online subjective testing.
dcterms:title: MS-SNSD

dcterms:creator: C. Valentini-Botinhao
X. Wang
S. Takaki
J. Yamagishi
dcterms:description: A dataset investigating RNN-based speech enhancement methods for noise-robust Text-to-Speech applications.
dcterms:title: Valentiniâ€™s dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Mathur
F. Kawsar
N. Berthouze
N. D. Lane
dcterms:description: A new speech dataset for unsupervised domain adaptation, primarily developed for automatic speech recognition research.
dcterms:title: Libri-Adapt

dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: An ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, providing a large dataset for automatic speech recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Librispeech-clean-100

dcterms:creator: M. Todisco
X. Wang
V. Vestman

dcterms:description: A dataset focused on spoofed and fake audio detection, providing resources for research in audio security.
dcterms:title: ASVspoof 2019
